meanings.sent1: The pathbreaking discovery revolutionized the field of science.
meanings.sent2: Her pathbreaking ideas inspired others to think outside the box.
meanings.sent3: The pathbreaking invention of a self-cleaning house made chores a thing of the past.
meanings.sent4: His pathbreaking approach to problem-solving opened up new possibilities for success.
meanings.sent5: The pathbreaking artwork left a lasting impression on all who viewed it.

meanings.definition: Setting a new standard or trend.
meanings.sent1: The company aims to pathbreaking the industry with its innovative products.
meanings.sent2: She hopes to pathbreaking the fashion world with her unique designs.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to pathbreaking the culinary scene by introducing a fusion of flavors.
meanings.sent4: His bold decision to pathbreaking the traditional norms paid off in the long run.
meanings.sent5: The musician's latest album seeks to pathbreaking the music industry with its fresh sound.
